title: Question:
author: shinsangmin
content: On March 9th, Milkomeda N surged to 2 ETH (4 million KRW) following news of GalleryCoin(GLR) being listed on the global cryptocurrency exchange, LBank, which was issued by Canvas N. According to OpenSea at 11:20 on the 9th, Milkomeda N hit its highest price.This event brings good news once again to the Milkomeda N project, which successfully minted 10,000 tokens at a maximum domestic price of 1 million won in 2022. The renewed highest price of Milkomeda N, which has maintained a floor price of 1 ETH for a long period, is considered a signal to inject new vitality into the Korea NFT industry, which has been stagnant.The news that GalleryCoin would bring significant benefits to Milkomeda N holders also contributed to the rise in Milkomeda's price. This free airdrop event for GalleryCoin, which exceeds the purchase price of Milkomeda N, will give 1,000 GLR to common holders, 1,500 GLR to rare item holders, and 3,000 GLR to legendary holders based on the snapshot taken on March 10th at 5 pm KST. Participation can be made through the Google form provided in the Canvas N platform notice or Discord. The first airdrop schedule is from April 10th to April 30th, 2023, and a total of three airdrops are scheduled to be conducted in 2023.CANVASN GALLERY PTE. LTD., a subsidiary of Canvas N, is preparing for the official opening of the Canvas N platform, which will utilize GalleryCoin, and the opening of offline galleries. With the launch of Milkomeda N and GalleryCoin, Canvas N Gallery will provide various services related to art technology and steadily increase its driving force.CANVASN GALLERY PTE. LTD. official stated, "The employees were surprised by the enthusiastic support of Milkomeda N holders," and said, "We will continue to make efforts to increase the value of GalleryCoin and Milkomeda N in response to the support and expectations."▶GalleryCoin site: http://www.canvasn.io/▶Canvas N platform: https://www.canvasn.co.kr/▶Discord: https://discord.gg/milkomeda-n▶Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/@canvasn▶Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/canvasn_official/▶Twitter: https://twitter.com/CanvasNofficialSource: http://sjbnews.com/news/news.php?number=773734
